name: SvelteKit hooks.handle 最小
description: SvelteKitのhooks.server.tsで簡単なログ/ヘッダ付与を行う最小例。

files.template:
import type { Handle } from '@sveltejs/kit';
export const handle: Handle = async ({ event, resolve }) => { console.log('req', event.url.pathname); const res = await resolve(event, { filterSerializedResponseHeaders: () => new Set(['content-type']) }); res.headers.set('x-powered-by','sveltekit'); return res; };
